channel.title: Trouble launching client [317 PI]
channel.description:
Hey guys, i just downloaded a new source to work on. I have the server launching fine but when i attempt to launch the client, it gives me this error: [code]java.util.zip.ZipException: error in opening zip file at java.util.zip.ZipFile.open(Native Method) at java.util.zip.ZipFile.(init)(Unknown Source) at java.util.zip.ZipFile.(init)(Unknown Source) at java.util.zip.ZipFile.(init)(Unknown Source) at Update.unZipFile(Update.java:29) at client.streamLoaderForName(client.java:4918) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:33) at client.run(client.java:6303) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)[/code]
Any help please? and thank you.

item.title: Trouble launching client [317 PI]
item.dc:creator: @ultimatepkvillage ultimatepkvillage
item.description:
@ultimatepkvillage wrote:

The cache was not zipped properly or the link where the cache downloads is no longer good. The path to where the cache downloads may not be set (signlink.java)

Read full topic

item.description:
@im4ever12c wrote:

Hey guys, i just downloaded a new source to work on. I have the server launching fine but when i attempt to launch the client, it gives me this error:

Any help please? and thank you.
